value.halfverse: how exalted is your Name in all the world!
your majesty is praised above the heavens.
value.verse: Out of the mouths of infants and children *
You have set up a stronghold against your adversaries, *
value.halfverse: to quell the enemy and the avenger.
the moon and the stars you have set in their courses,
value.verse: When I consider your heavens, the work of your fingers, *
What is man that you should be mindful of him? *
value.halfverse: the son of man that you should seek him out?

value.verse: You have made him but little lower than the angels; *
value.halfverse: you adorn him with glory and honor;

value.verse: You give him mastery over the works of your hands; *
value.halfverse: you put all things under his feet:
even the wild beasts of the field,
and whatsoever walks in the paths of the sea.
value.verse: The birds of the air, the fish of the sea, *

value.halfverse: how exalted is you Name in all the world!
